> ::DarkMouse::
> 
> She sneered at the creepy spider bot when she was called a slut.  She 
> hated being caged. but this may be the only way to get to Quickstrike.
> Se walked into the vault and looked at the spider. "He's not my 
> boyfriend. He's my commander. I am programmed to follow him. Got a 
> problem with it?" she knew she should have held her tongue, but she 
> wanted this bot to know that she was following orders and 
> programming, not just her spark.  
> "I'll stay here, but I still wish to see my commander."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> >     Black Aracnia led Darkmouse deep into the innards of Trypticon. 
> As foar 
> > as she was concerned, she was the commander now. She single 
> handedly saved 
> > the ship, and the dominance of the Predacons as well.
> >     "Alright you parasitic slut, you'lll be caged here until I talk 
> with 
> > Megatron. Your boyfriend is eight levels up, and the internal 
> weponry is 
> > still armed and ready so I suggest you stay put." Aracnia said, 
> motioning 
> > with her gun for Darkmouse to enter the vault where energon was 
> formerly kept.
> > 
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > 
> >     The mirk of the swapms was the thickest in all the beast wars. 
> No other 
> > place was as dismal or dark as the swamps that bordered the 
> Predacon and 
> > Maximal territories. They were vast, deep, and housed some of the 
> most 
> > dangerous prehistoric creatures anyone had seen.
> >     Among all the chaos of the bugs and aquatic life of the swamp, 
> a long 
> > lost and forgotten stasis pod slipped from its peach and floated to 
> the bank 
> > of a body of water.
> >     The computer, now able to activate, began the DNA scanning 
> process to 
> > select the beast mode of the protoform within. The sphere rose, and 
> scanned 
> > the vast area of the swamp. After a double pass, it selected the 
> most 
> > powerful beast mode according to the habitat.
> >     The sphere rejoined the pod, and the transformation began. 
> Moments past 
> > and the computer bagan to read off the data needed by the new form 
> to survive 
> > in the beast wars.
> >     With a crack, the door opened and the new warrior crawled out 
> of the pod 
> > and on to the bank of the swamp. He looked around. With the 
> complete history 
> > of the beast wars stored in his data banks, he would be able to 
> handle 
> > himself in this new world.
> >     Looking, he said to himself, "Ah, this beast mode shall make a 
> fine body. 
> > Now all I need to do is to transform."
> >     Paralysis said the code word and his Predacon Beast Mode 
> emerged. The 
> > frog changed into an armored knight of the Predacon dynasty. He was 
> armed 
> > with a toxen gun, a semi-automatic pistol, and optic lasers. 
> >     "Ha! Now to contact the Predacons...and to end the reign of the 
> Maximals!"
